metaData.title: Zlatna pool trail. For bikes
metaData.description: This is not just a simple trail to the pool, as you'll have to climb by bike the 'Dealul Mare' to reach the invigorating pool.

specificArticles.textContent: The trail to 'Zlatna', and old mining town where they are trying to encourage tourism. The good thing is that they succeed to do something. The proof is this luxurious public pool and the pedestrian alley next to it. But to reach the 'revitalizing' pool, you will have to pedal up on the 'Dealul Mare' hill, through beech and coniferous forests. The more exhausted you are when you reach Zlatna, the better the bath will be :)

specificArticles.title: Dealul Mare
specificArticles.textContent: The road along 'Dealul Mare' is wonderful, and it worth climbing it up. It's nice to pedal through the cold shadow of the beech forest, where you will find many resting points.

specificArticles.title: The 'Zlatna' pool
specificArticles.textContent: 'Zlatna Sport Center este un complex sportiv cu dotări la nivel internațional. Aici găsiți bazine înot (ștrand adulți și copii) în aer liber cu apă încalzita , Centrul SPA, teren tenis zgură și teren fotbal.' Prețurile de intrare sunt mai mult decât acceptabile.

'Zlatna Sport Center has top facilities. It has outdoor swimming pools for adults and children, with heated water, a SPA resort, tennis court and football fields. The entrance fees is cheap (~5 euros).
